channel.title: FOSS Pulchowk
channel.description: A site of FOSS community of Pulchowk Campus. This community promotes Free and Open Source Software in Pulchowk Campus.

item.title: Foss Stall in Locus 2015
item.description:
FOSS Pulchowk is setting up a stall at the Locus 2015. This event is going to be held on Falgun 8, 9, 10 on Institue of Engineering Central Campus, Pulchowk, Lalipur. Please visit the stall and make this Program Sucessful.

We will be:

  1. Distributing Linux iso file
  2. Answering queries about open source software and rasising awareness about it
  3. Installing Linux for those who needs assistants.
  4. Encouraging to Participate in open source software.

We would like to Thank our Volunters:

  1. Anish Shrestha (full time)
  2. Sujit Maharjan
  3. Manish Munikar
  4. Kritesh Pahi

item.title: Welcome to FOSS Pulchowk
item.description:
Welcome to FOSS Pulchowk! I am Sujit Maharjan, a student of Electronics Engineer and this site is dedicated to FOSS community of IOE, Pulchwok Campus. It provides information about FOSS Pulchowk and agenda of FOSS Pulchowk.

If you want to follow me please do click on the twitter button on the sidebar. Please will free to look at my github account to see things I have created and even fork it.
